title: 3 and Out - Baker to Panthers Reaction, USC B1G Defection, RIP Pac-12
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Baker to Panthers Reaction, USC B1G Defection, RIP Pac-12
description:
John reacts to Baker Mayfield getting dealt from the Browns to the Panthers, and how Baker and Darnold can co-exist. He also gives his take on USC’s defection to the B1G, how UCLA can become relevant from the move and his thoughts on the death of the Pac-12 from the perspective of a lifelong West Coast sports fan, and who’s to blame. #herd

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
